mapper.insert: insert into setmeal(category_id, name, price, status, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description}, #{image}, now(), now(), #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select s.*, c.name as categoryName from setmeal s left join category c on s.category_id = c.id
